attributes.action: A history of no rent arrears should be enough to rent a property.
attributes.background: Currently when renting a property a credit check is carried out on prospective tenants. This means a people who have  NEVER had rent arrears are being overlooked & rejected for properties over non housing related debts, that could be from years ago which is unfair & adding to the housing crisis.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for deciding what checks to do before renting someone a property.
